trans-unit.source: Specifies the feature requirements that bindings must provide to the service or client implementation.
trans-unit.target: 指定繫結必須提供給服務或用戶端實作的功能需求。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute> to instruct [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] to confirm that the binding provides the features required by the service or client implementation.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute> 指示 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 確認繫結提供服務或用戶端實作所需的功能。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute> attribute is detected when a service description is loaded from an application configuration file or built programmatically in code, WCF validates the configured binding and supports all the features that the attribute specifies.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute>載入應用程式組態檔或程式碼中以程式設計方式建立的服務描述時，偵測到屬性，WCF 驗證設定的繫結，並支援屬性指定的所有功能。

trans-unit.source: For example, your service may require the bindings to support queuing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您的服務可能需要繫結支援佇列。

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute> allows WCF to confirm that the following requirements are met:
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute>允許 WCF 確認滿足下列需求：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.QueuedDeliveryRequirements%2A> property specifies the queuing requirements that a binding must meet.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.QueuedDeliveryRequirements%2A> 屬性指定繫結必須符合的佇列需求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.RequireOrderedDelivery%2A> property indicates whether the binding must support ordered messaging.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.RequireOrderedDelivery%2A> 屬性表示繫結是否必須支援已排序訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.TargetContract%2A> property indicates to which type the requirements apply.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.TargetContract%2A> 屬性指出需求套用至哪個類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute> attribute is applied to a class, which can implement any number of service contract interfaces.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute> 屬性套用至類別，可實作任何數量的服務合約介面。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute> can be applied to all the contracts the class implements or to only one of them.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute> 可套用至類別實作的所有合約或僅套用至其中一個。

trans-unit.source: The attribute can be applied to a class more than once.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可不只一次地套用至類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The defaults are:
trans-unit.target: 預設為：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.QueuedDeliveryRequirements%2A> property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode.Allowed>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.QueuedDeliveryRequirements%2A> 屬性設定為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode.Allowed>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.RequireOrderedDelivery%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.RequireOrderedDelivery%2A> 屬性設定為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the binding for a service must support queued contracts.
trans-unit.target: 指定服務的繫結是否必須支援佇列合約。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode" /> values; the default is <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode.Allowed" />.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode" /> 值，預設值為 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode.Allowed" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode.Required> instructs WCF to confirm that the binding supports queued delivery.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode.Required>會指示 WCF 以確認繫結支援佇列的傳遞。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode.NotAllowed> value instructs WCF to confirm that the binding does not support queued delivery.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode.NotAllowed>值會指示 WCF 以確認繫結不支援佇列的傳遞。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute> attribute to instruct WCF to confirm at runtime that the actual binding does not support queued contracts but does support ordered messages.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute>屬性指示 WCF 確認執行階段實際繫結不支援佇列的合約，但支援已排序訊息。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 該值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the binding must support ordered messages.
trans-unit.target: 指定繫結是否必須支援已排序的訊息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] to confirm that the binding must support the ordering of messages; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 指示 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 確認繫結必須支援已排序訊息；否則，<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.RequireOrderedDelivery%2A> property to `false` instructs WCF to perform no validation.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.RequireOrderedDelivery%2A>屬性`false`會指示 WCF 執行任何驗證。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute> attribute to instruct WCF to confirm at runtime that the actual binding does support ordered messages.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute>屬性指示 WCF 確認執行階段實際繫結並支援已排序訊息。

trans-unit.source: The contract description.
trans-unit.target: 合約描述。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint for the contract.
trans-unit.target: 合約的服務端點。

trans-unit.source: The binding parameters.
trans-unit.target: 繫結參數。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.System#ServiceModel#Description#IContractBehavior#AddBindingParameters(System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription,System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint,System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection)" /> method to attach binding parameters correctly.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.System#ServiceModel#Description#IContractBehavior#AddBindingParameters(System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription,System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint,System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection)" /> 方法以正確附加繫結參數。

trans-unit.source: The contract description to which the behavior is attached.
trans-unit.target: 要附加行為的合約描述。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint for the contract.
trans-unit.target: 合約的端點。

trans-unit.source: The client runtime on which the behavior operates.
trans-unit.target: 行為操作的用戶端執行階段。

trans-unit.source: Implementation of the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.System#ServiceModel#Description#IContractBehavior#ApplyClientBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription,System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime)" /> method for client support.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端支援的 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.System#ServiceModel#Description#IContractBehavior#ApplyClientBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription,System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime)" /> 方法實作。

trans-unit.source: The contract description to which the behavior is attached.
trans-unit.target: 要附加行為的合約描述。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint for the contract.
trans-unit.target: 合約的端點。

trans-unit.source: The dispatch runtime that supports the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 支援端點的分派執行階段。

trans-unit.source: Implementation of the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription,System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchRuntime)" /> method that enables service support.
trans-unit.target: 啟用服務支援的 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription,System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchRuntime)" /> 方法實作。

trans-unit.source: The contract description.
trans-unit.target: 合約描述。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to be validated.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的端點。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.System#ServiceModel#Description#IContractBehavior#Validate(System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription,System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint)" /> method to enable validation support.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.System#ServiceModel#Description#IContractBehavior#Validate(System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription,System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint)" /> 方法以啟用驗證支援。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type to which it applies.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用的類型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to which the attribute applies.
trans-unit.target: 屬性要套用的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: A service class can implement any number of service contract interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 服務類別可實作任意數目的服務合約介面。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.TargetContract%2A> property to validate that endpoints with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.TargetContract%2A> have bindings that support the requirements.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.TargetContract%2A> 屬性驗證具有 <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.TargetContract%2A> 的端點擁有支援要求的繫結。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be used any number of times on the same class.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性可對相同類別使用，次數不限。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute> attribute to instruct WCF to confirm at runtime that the actual binding does not support queued contracts but does support ordered messages.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute>屬性指示 WCF 確認執行階段實際繫結不支援佇列的合約，但支援已排序訊息。

trans-unit.source: It also specifies the target contract to which this restriction should be applied.
trans-unit.target: 它也指定此限制套用的目標合約。
